Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 646 Park Conduct

646.01Rules and regulations; definitions. 646.02Activities. 646.03Animals. 646.04Camping. 646.05Commercial activities. 646.06Disorderly conduct. 646.07Fires. 646.08Fireworks. 646.09Hours. 646.10Natural areas. 646.11Refuse. 646.12Removal or destruction of property. 646.13Vehicle operation and parking. 646.14Water areas. 646.15Weapons. 646.16Activity permits. 646.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Power to regulate vehicle speed - see Ohio R.C. 4511.07(E)

Wild birds - see GEN. OFF. 618.16

Injuring bushes or trees - see GEN. OFF. 642.06

Criminal mischief - see GEN. OFF. 642.11
